Rayon Sports vs Espoir FC

Rayon Sports 4-0 Espoir FC

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Eric Tony Ukurikiyimfura

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

17:30

Rayon Sports ikomeje kotsa igitutu APR FC

Gutsinda uyu mukino bihesheje Rayon Sports kugira amanota 57 ku mwanya wa kabiri, isigara irushwa inota rimwe na APR FC ya mbere mu gihe amakipe yombi amaze gukina imikino 25.

Mwakoze ku bo twabanye uyu munsi, tuzasubire ejo ku wa Gatanu, tubagezaho umukino uzahuza APR FC na AS Kigali, zizakina umunsi wa 26 wa shampiyona kuri Stade ya Kigali.

17:27

Umukino urarangiye: Rayon Sports itahanye intsinzi

Umukino w'umunsi wa 25 waberaga hano kuri Stade ya Kigali urangiye Rayon Sports itsinze ibitego 4-0. Michael Sarpong na Jules Ulimwengu bombi batsinze ibitego byose, buri umwe atsinda bibiri.

17:26

90+4' Espoir FC ikomeje gusatira

Kyambadde Fred na Simpenzwe Hamidou bananiwe gutsindira ikipe yabo ku buryo babonye mu rubuga rw'amahina rwa Rayon Sports nyuma ya koruneri yari itewe na Nkurunziza Felicien.

17:25

Mu yindi mikino: Musanze FC itahanye intsinzi

Mu mukino waberaga kuri Stade Ubworoherane, Musanze FC itsinze Etincelles igitego 1-0 cya Barirengako Frank itahana amanota atatu.

17:22

90+1' Espoir FC ihushije igitego

Espoir FC yari isatiriye ishaka igitego cy'impozamarira ariko umupira utewe na Nkurunziza Felicien ufatwa na Mazimpaka Andre.

17:21

90' Iminota y'inyongera

Umusifuzi wa kane, Eric, yongereyeho iminota ine y'inyongera. Rayon Sports ikomeje gusatira aho Da Silva na Bukuru bananiwe gutsinda ku buryo babonye imbere y'izamu rya Espoir FC.

17:18

87' Espoir FC yari yitsinze

Ku mupira uhinduwe na Mugisha Gilbert, Simpenzwe Hamidou ashatse kuwukuraho, uhura n'umunyezamu Hussein wasohotse ku bw'amahirwe arawufata.

17:17

85' Gusimbuza kwa Rayon Sports

Mugisha Gilbert yinjiye mu kibuga asimbura Iradukunda Eric 'Radu'

17:16

84' Espoir FC yari igerageje gusatira

Niyitanga Youssuf na Ssemazzi John bari bagerageje kubaka, basatira Rayon Sports. Espoir FC ibonye koruneri ebyiri zikurikiranya, ariko ntacyo bitanze.

17:15

83' Gusimbuza kwa Rayon Sports

Bukuru Christophe yinjiye mu kibuga asimbura Manishimwe Djabel

17:13

82' Espoir FC ihushije igitego: Umupira ugaruwe n'umutambiko w'izamu

Mutsinzi Ange akiniye nabi Kyambadde Fred ku murongo w'urubuga rw'amahina, umusifuzi atanga coup-franc. Ssemazzi John ateye umupira mwiza ugarurwa n'umutambiko w'izamu, awusubijemo n'umutwe ufatwa na Mazimpaka Andre.

17:10

78' Umukino urahagaze

Umunya-Brazil Da Silva aryamye mu kibuga hasi nyuma yo gukinirwa nabi n'abakinnyi bakina inyuma ba Espoir FC. Asohowe mu kibuga yikanda mu rubavu, ubanza hari ikintu bamukubise.

17:08

76' Gusatira kwa Espoir FC

Uwineza Jean De Dieu ahinduye umupira uturutse mu ruhande rw'iburyo, Manzi Thierry azamuka mu kirere asumba Nkurunziza Felicien uwukozeho ujya hanze. Espoir FC ikomeje kugorwa no gutera mu izamu n'ubwo inyuzamo igakina neza.

17:06

74' Gusimbuza kwa Rayon Sports

Umunya-Brazil Jonathan Da Silva umaze iminsi adakoreshwa, yinjiye mu kibuga asimbura Michael Sarpong watsinze ibitego bibiri uyu munsi, akuzuza ibitego 13 muri shampiyona.

17:04

72' Gusimbuza kwa Espoir FC

Nkurunziza Felicien yinjiye mu kibuga asimbura Renzaho Hussein ku ruhande rwa Espoir FC, ibi bitumye iyi kipe ihindura imikinire, Nkunzimana Sadi ajya gushaka igitego.

17:01

70' Umukino uhagazeho gato

Umukino uhagaze gato mu gihe hari kuvurwa umunyezamu wa Espoir FC Ndayishimiye Hussein wagize akabazo k'imvune. Espoir FC yiteguraga gukora impinduka za nyuma yinjiza mu kibuga umukinnyi ariko babaye bitonze ngo bategereze uko bigenda.

16:58

67' Saidi Abed ahawe ikarita itukura

Mu gihe abakinnyi babiri ba Espoir FC, Renzaho Hussein na Nkunzimana Sadi bahawe amakarita y'umuhondo kubera kutishimira imisifurire, umutoza wabo Saidi Abed Makasi ahawe ikarita itukura, azamurwa mu bafana.

16:56

66' Igitego cya kane cya Rayon Sports

Jules Ulimwengu atsinze igitego cya kane cya Rayon Sports. Iyi kipe yari imaze akanya yisirisimba imbere y'izamu, birangiye ibonye igitego cya kane cy'uyu rutahizamu wujuje ibitego 16 kugeza ubu

16:50

60' Rayon Sports ikomeje guhusha uburyo bwinshi

Abakinnyi basatira ba Rayon Sports barimo Sarpong, Djabel na Ulimwengu bakomeje guhusha uburyo butandukanye, aho umupira uruhukira mu biganza bya Ndayishimiye Hussein. Manzi Thierry wazamutse gushaka igitego, ashyize umutwe ku mupira wari utewe na Rutanga ujya hejuru y'izamu.

16:48

55' Gusimbuza kwa Espoir FC

Uzayisenga Maurice wa Espoir FC asimbuwe na Niyitanga Youssuf.

16:44

52' Igitego cya gatatu cya Rayon Sports

Ku mupira utewe na Rutanga Eric, Michael Sarpong arawuretse, Jules Ulimwengu aragenda arawufata acenga umunyezamu Hussein, atsinda igitego cya 15 muri Shampiyona. Saidi Abed ntiyishimiye ko umusifuzi wo ku ruhande atasifuye ko habayeho kurarira, ajya gushwana n'abasifuzi

16:41

49' Rayon Sports itangiye igice cya kabiri iri hejuru

Manishimwe Djabel anaiwe kubyaza umusaruro umupira abonye mu rubuga rw'amahina, abakinnyi ba Espoir FC bawushyira muri koruneri itewe na Radu, habura mugenzi we uwukoraho. Sefu na Sarpong bongeye kunanirwa gutsinda ku mupira ubagezeho mu rubuga rw'amahina.

16:39

48' Espoir FC ntabwo bahuza

Abakinnyi ba Espoir FC baragerageza kubaka, bahanahana umupira ariko bagahita bawutakaza. Nkunzimana Sadi yari yinjiye neza, ashatse guhereza Ssemazzi, Rutanga akiza izamu.

16:36

Igice cya kabiri kiratangiye

Nkundimana Sadi na bagenzi be batangije igice cya kabiri cy'uyu mukino uri kubera i Nyamirambo. Rayon Sports yongeye gutangira isatira, Rutanga ateye umupira ujya hanze.

16:35

Mu yindi mikino: Musanze FC iyoboye umukino kuri Stade Ubworoherane

Undi mukino mukino w'umunsi wa 25 wa shampiyona uri guhuza Musanze FC na Etincelles kuri Stade Ubworoherane, igice cya mbere cyarangiye Barirengako Frank yatsindiye iyi kipe iri mu rugo.

16:20

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

16:20

45+1' Ulimwengu ahushije igitego cyabazwe

Uyu rutahizamu w'umurundi ukinira Rayon Sports yinjiranye umupira asiga kapiteni wa Espoir FC, Wilondja Jacques, ashatse kuroba Ndayishimiye Hussein afata umupira neza.

16:18

45' Iminota ibiri y'inyongera

Rayon Sports ikomeje kwiharira umukino. Kugeza ubu nta buryo bukomeye abakinnyi ba Espoir FC barimo Renzaho Hussein, Sadi na Ssemazzi barabona ngo batere mu izamu rya Mazimpaka Andre

16:13

39' Gusimbuza kwa Espoir FC

Ndayisenga Salim bitakundiye uyu munsi mu kibuga hagati, asimbuwe na Ngiriyeze Mudeyi Abdoul ku ruhande rwa Espoir FC. Umutoza Saidi Abed Makasi ahisemo gukora impinduka kuko Rayon Sports yamurushaga cyane mu kibuga hagati.

16:10

37' Ikindi gitego cya Rayon Sports kiranzwe

Manishimwe Djabel ateye ishoti rikomeye, umunyezamu Ndayishimiye Hussein akuramo umupira usanga Ulimwengu uhise uwushyira mu izamu umusifuzi wo ku ruhande avuga ko habayeho kurarira.

16:06

33' Rayon Sports ikomeje guhusha uburyo bwabazwe

Manishimwe Djabel ahawe umupira hafi n'izamu, acenga asubira inyuma, imbere y'umusifuzi akorerwa ikosa na Wilondja. Araryihaniye ateye umupira ufatwa neza na Ndayishimiye Hussein.

Michael Sarpong na we ahawe umupira mwiza mu rubuga rw'amahina, ashatse kuroba Hussein umupira ugarurwa n'uyu munyezamu.

16:00

28' Rayon Sports ihushije igitego cyabazwe

Umunyezamu Ndayishimiye Hussein asohotse gufasha myugariro we ku mupira wari winjiranwe na Ulimwengu, awukoraho ukiri hanze y'urubuga rw'amahina, ahita ahabwa ikarita y'umuhondo. Rutanga Eric ahannye iri kosa umupira ujya hejuru y'izamu.

15:58

25' Ssemazzi yasabaga penaliti

Rutahizamu wa Espoir FC Ssemazzi John yinjiranye umupira ahawe na mugenzi we mu rubuga rw'amahina, ukorwa na Manzi Thierry umusifuzi avuga ko ntacyabaye.

15:57

23' Gusatira kwa Rayon Sports

Umupira wari ufitwe na Ulimwengu urengejwe na Wilondja wugarijwe muri iyi minota, Urenguriwe Manishimwe Djabel akinana na Sefu ariko bahita batakaza umupira kuri Espoir FC.

15:52

19' Igitego cya kabiri cya Rayon Sports

Michael Sarpong atsinze igitego cya kabiri cya Rayon Sports n'umutwe ku mupira uhinduwe na Jules Ulimwengu. Rayon Sports yihariye umupira mu minota yose ishize, aho iri gukinira hafi n'izamu rya Espoir FC. Abakinnyi bugarira ba Espoir FC bagowe no gucunga abarimo Ulimwengu na Sarpong.

15:50

17' Umukino uhagaze gato

Salim wa Espoir FC akiniwe nabi na Sefu hafi n'izamu rya Espoir FC, abanza kuvurwa mbere yo kujya hanze.

15:48

14' Igitego cya Rayon Sports

Michael Sarpong afunguye amazamu ku munota wa 14 w'umukino ku mupira uhinduwe na Iradukunda Eric 'Radu'. Uyu rutahizamu w'umunya-Ghana aturutse mu kibuga hagati, atanga umupira kuri Rutanga ukinannye na Radu mbere y'uko amusubiza umupira agatsinda igitego.

15:46

12' Coup-franc ya Rayon Sports

Michael Sarpong azamukanye umupira mu ruhande rw'iburyo, Wilondja amukorera ikosa. Umupira uteretswe ahagana muri koruneri utewe na Rutanga Eric habura mugenzi we ukoraho ukomeza hanze urarenga.

15:43

9' Umunyezamu wa Espoir FC agize akabazo

Michael Sarpong ahinduye umupira mwiza mu rubuga rw'amahina, Jules Ulimwengu wari wazamutse ashaka kuwutanga umunyezamu wa Espoir FC amukorera ikosa n'ubwo umusifuzi wo ku ruhande yavugaga ko yaraririye.

Umukino uhagaze gato havurwa uyu munyezamu Ndayishimiye Hussein.

15:41

8' Coup-franc ya Rayon Sports inyuma y'urubuga rw'amahina

Jules Ulimwengu azamukanye umupira asiga abakinnyi ba Espoir FC. Kapiteni wayo Wilondja Jacques amutereka hasi inyuma gato y'urubuga rw'amahina. Manishimwe Djabel ahannye iri kosa umupira uramutenguha uca ku ruhande rw'izamu.

15:39

6' Rayon Sports ikomeje gusatira

Salim akoreye ikosa kuri Ulimwengu Jules mu kibuga hagati, Rayon Sports ihannye iri kosa, abakinnyi batanga umupira kuri Niyonzima Olivier Sefu uteye ishoti umupira ujya hanze.

Rayon Sports yongeye gusatira, umusifuzi avuga ko Ulimwengu yarayemo. Iki cyemezo nticyakiriwe neza n'umutoza Robertinho.

15:37

4' Igitego cya Rayon Sports kiranzwe

Radu akorewe ikosa hafi n'izamu rya Espoir FC ahagana muri koruneri, ikosa rihanwe na Rutanga Eric umupira usanga Ulimwengu aho yari ahagaze atereka umupira mu izamu n'umutwe ariko umusifuzi avuga ko habayeho kurarira.

15:34

2' Amakipe yombi atangiye asatirana

Umupira wa mbere ugana mu izamu utewe na Michael Sarpong n'umutwe uvuye kuri Sefu, ufatwa n'umunyezamu Ndayishimiye. Espoir FC ihise ikora contre-attaque, Rayon Sports iyambura umupira Sarpong ateye imbere habura mugenzi we ukurikira.

15:32

Umukino uratangiye

Umukino utangijwe n'ikipe ya Rayon Sports, Jules Ulimwengu akinana na Manishimwe Djabel, atanga umupira kuri Niyonzima Olivier Sefu ukiniwe nabi.


Rayon Sports yambaye imyambaro yayo y'umweru irimo amabara y'ubururu mu gihe Espoir FC yambaye imyambaro y'umutuku isanzwe yambara. Umukino ubanza wahuje amakipe yombi i Rusizi, yanganyije ubusa ku busa.

Undi mukino uri guhuza Musanze FC na Etincelles kuri Stade Ubworoherane.

15:25

Abakinnyi babanjemo ku mpande zombi

Rayon Sports: Mazimpaka Andre, Manzi Thierry, Mutsinzi Ange, Habimana Hussein, Kakule Mugheni Fabrice, Michael Sarpong, Iradukunda Eric, Niyonzima Olivier, Rutanga Eric, Manishimwe Djabel, Ulimwengu Jules.

Umutoza: Robertinho.

Espoir FC: Ndayishimiye Hussein, Wilondja Jacques, Uwineza Jean De Dieu, Moninga Walusambo, Uzayisenga Maurice, Renzaho Hussein, Ndayisenga Salim, Kyambadde Fred, Nkunzimana Sadi, Ssemazzi John.

Umutoza: Saidi Abed Makasi

15:21

Ikaze kuri Stade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo

Tubahaye ikaze kuri Stade ya Kigali hagiye kubera umukino w'umunsi wa 25 wa shampiyona hagati ya Rayon Sports na Espoir FC. Rayon Sports yakiriye uyu mukino ifite amanota 54 ku mwanya wa kabiri, aho gutsinda uyu mukino biza gutuma isigara irushwa inota rimwe na APR FC ya mbere. Espoir FC ifite amanota 32 ku mwanya wa munani.
